statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, device_id, message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Alert';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_notifications;
SELECT MAX(created_at) FROM smart_home_notifications;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_id, notification_type FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE message LIKE '%motion%';
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM smart_home_notifications;
SELECT id, created_at FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Warning' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id FROM smart_home_notifications;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE message = 'System Error' OR message = 'Connection Lost';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-28';
SELECT id, message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE created_at >= '2021-06-01' AND created_at < '2021-07-01';
SELECT device_id, notification_type FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE '%Fire%';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE message IS NULL;
SELECT id, message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id = 456;
SELECT id, device_id, notification_type, message, created_at FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT id, device_id, notification_type, message, created_at FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Alert' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as total_alerts FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Alert' GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, AVG(id) as avg_notification_id FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id, notification_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_id, DATE(created_at) as notification_date, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id, notification_date;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as total_devices FROM smart_home_notifications;
SELECT device_id, MAX(created_at) as latest_notification FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MIN(created_at) as earliest_notification FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) as month FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id, notification_type, month;
SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) = 2022 GROUP BY device_id, notification_type;

SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, EXTRACT(WEEK FROM created_at) as week FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM created_at) = 2022 GROUP BY device_id, notification_type, week;
SELECT device_id, AVG(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM created_at)) as avg_notification_hour FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, (SELECT message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE device_id = 3 LIMIT 1) as sample_message FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, CONCAT('Notification: ', notification_type) as formatted_notification_type FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id, notification_type;

SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, CONCAT('Device: ', device_id, ' - Notification: ', notification_type) as formatted_info FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id, notification_type;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as total_notifications, SUBSTRING(message, 1, 20) as short_message FROM smart_home_notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE message LIKE '%warning%' GROUP BY device_id, notification_type;
SELECT device_id, notification_type, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE message LIKE '%important%' GROUP BY device_id, notification_type;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT message FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%iPhone%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications;
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_notification FROM notifications;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(*) AS type_count FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type;
SELECT device_id, AVG(notification_id) AS avg_notification_id FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MIN(created_at) AS earliest_notification FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT device_id, MAX(created_at) AS latest_notification FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, SUM(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS notification_count FROM notifications WHERE device_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10 GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT MAX(created_at) - MIN(created_at) AS time_difference FROM notifications;
SELECT is_active, COUNT(*) AS active_devices FROM devices GROUP BY is_active;
SELECT device_name, location, is_active FROM devices WHERE last_update < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 123 AND created_at >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, devices.device_name FROM notifications INNER JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE devices.location = 'Office';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'info' OR notification_type = 'warning';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert';
SELECT device_id, AVG(notification_id) AS avg_notification_id FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE AND last_update BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'alert');
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE location = 'Home');
SELECT device_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(notification_id) > 5;
SELECT MAX(notification_id) AS max_notification_id, MIN(notification_id) AS min_notification_id, AVG(notification_id) AS avg_notification_id FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type, message, created_at FROM notifications WHERE device_id = (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Mobile Device');
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%Building%' AND is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

SELECT device_name, location, COUNT(notification_type) AS total_notifications FROM devices LEFT JOIN notifications ON devices.device_id = notifications.device_id GROUP BY device_name, location ORDER BY total_notifications DESC;
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, devices.device_name FROM notifications INNER JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE devices.is_active = TRUE;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT id, message, timestamp FROM notifications;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE location = 'Home';
SELECT device_id, status FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Smartphone';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number = '123456789';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices INNER JOIN notifications ON devices.device_id = notifications.device_id;
SELECT user_id, username, device_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, d.device_name FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id;
SELECT d.device_id, d.device_name, n.message FROM devices d JOIN notifications n ON d.device_id = n.device_id;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, n.message FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id JOIN notifications n ON d.device_id = n.device_id;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, n.message FROM users u, devices d, notifications n WHERE u.user_id = d.device_id AND d.device_id = n.device_id;
SELECT u.username AS user, d.device_name AS device, n.message AS notification FROM users u JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.device_id JOIN notifications n ON d.device_id = n.device_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) as device_count FROM devices GROUP BY location HAVING device_count > 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(timestamp) as latest_timestamp FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY latest_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT notifications.id, notifications.message, devices.device_name FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT notifications.message, devices.location FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE devices.device_name = 'Device A';
SELECT notifications.message, devices.location, users.username FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id JOIN users ON devices.device_id = users.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM notifications;
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM notifications;
SELECT AVG(device_id) FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) FROM notifications;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(id) AS notification_count FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(id) AS notification_count FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE devices.status = 'Active' GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications UNION SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE message LIKE '%error%' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE location = 'Floor 1');
SELECT devices.device_name, notifications.message, notifications.timestamp FROM devices LEFT JOIN notifications ON devices.device_id = notifications.device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(id) AS notification_count FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 10;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(id) AS notification_count FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT device_name, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_notification FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id GROUP BY device_name;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS notification_count, DATE(timestamp) AS notification_date FROM notifications GROUP BY DATE(timestamp);
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type='phone';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications;
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number='1234567890';
SELECT device_id, user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE timestamp>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, last_updated FROM devices LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notifications;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM devices;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM notifications);
SELECT device_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type='routine';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id=1001;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM maintenance_logs);
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenances FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, last_updated FROM devices WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, last_updated FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'tablet' AND last_updated < '2022-05-01';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, last_updated FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT device_id, user_id, message, timestamp FROM notifications ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'laptop');
SELECT device_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM devices;
SELECT MAX(last_updated) AS latest_update FROM devices;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM maintenance_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM notifications GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM notifications UNION SELECT device_id, user_id FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, users.username AS user_assigned FROM devices LEFT JOIN users ON devices.device_id = users.user_id;
SELECT users.username, maintenance_logs.maintenance_type, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date FROM users RIGHT JOIN maintenance_logs ON users.user_id = maintenance_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, device_id, message, created_at FROM notifications;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users;
SELECT log_id, notification_id, user_id, status, timestamp FROM notifications_log;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT device_id, start_date, end_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT notification_id, device_id, status, timestamp FROM notifications_log;
SELECT notification_id, message, created_at, status, timestamp FROM notifications, notifications_log;
SELECT user_id, username, email, log_id, notification_id FROM users, notifications_log;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM devices, maintenance_schedule;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM devices INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON devices.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id;

SELECT notification_id, message, status, timestamp, device_name, location FROM notifications, notifications_log, devices WHERE notifications.device_id = devices.device_id AND notifications_log.notification_id = notifications.notification_id;

SELECT user_id, username, email, status, timestamp, device_name FROM users, notifications_log, devices WHERE users.user_id = notifications_log.user_id AND devices.device_id = notifications_log.device_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT status, timestamp FROM notifications_log WHERE log_id = 4;
SELECT device_id, start_date, end_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE schedule_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT notification_id, device_id, message FROM notifications WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, devices.device_name FROM notifications JOIN devices ON notifications.device_id = devices.device_id;
SELECT COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM notifications;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM devices WHERE location = 'Living Room');
SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, notifications_log.status FROM notifications JOIN notifications_log ON notifications.notification_id = notifications_log.notification_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, users.username FROM notifications JOIN notifications_log ON notifications.notification_id = notifications_log.notification_id JOIN users ON notifications_log.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT devices.location, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM devices LEFT JOIN notifications ON devices.device_id = notifications.device_id GROUP BY devices.location;
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_id NOT IN (SELECT notification_id FROM notifications_log);

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, maintenance_schedule.start_date FROM notifications LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON notifications.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id;
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM maintenance_schedule;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications_log.status, maintenance_schedule.start_date FROM notifications JOIN notifications_log ON notifications.notification_id = notifications_log.notification_id LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON notifications.device_id = maintenance_schedule.device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_maintenance_schedules FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_maintenance_schedules > 0;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices UNION SELECT device_id, device_name FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT device_id, location FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Kitchen%';
SELECT devices.location, COUNT(notification_id) AS total_notifications FROM devices RIGHT JOIN notifications ON devices.device_id = notifications.device_id GROUP BY devices.location;
SELECT users.username, notifications_log.status FROM users JOIN notifications_log ON users.user_id = notifications_log.user_id WHERE notifications_log.status = 'SENT';
SELECT device_id, MIN(start_date) AS earliest_maintenance FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY device_id;

SELECT notifications.notification_id, notifications.message, notifications_log.status FROM notifications JOIN notifications_log ON notifications.notification_id = notifications_log.notification_id WHERE notifications_log.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
